thread.title: Peter Schlippe

author: Peter Schlippe
title: Peter Schlippe
text: Bravofly acknowledged the tickets correctly to me,- but I later found out that they booked 1 month wrong at the airline. This I did not know until I was going to take the flight. So I had to buy new expensive tickets at the airport. Now 4 months later I still haven´t recieved my money for the new ticket I had to buy. I can´t talk to anyone who can make a decision over the phone, so I have to e-mail customer service. Their reaction time is always minimum 6 days. Bravofly acknowledged that they made a mistake, and that they will pay me, but they just don´t pay. Nothing happens. I can´t recommend to use Bravofly.
